item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

(NPCID == 2234 && playerHasItem((4447,1))

Looks more like a perenthesis issue…

try adding one to the end or removing one from playerhasitem

like so
(NPCID == 2234 && playerHasItem((4447,1)))
(NPCID == 2234 && playerHasItem(4447,1))

Read full topic

item.title: Help please

thanks, i think that might have been the problem.

Read full topic

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @Bandos1337 Bandos1337
item.description:
@Bandos1337 wrote:

use “c.”!
c.getItems().addItem(id);
instead of
addItem(id);
and c.playerXP[21]+=50000;
instead of
addSkillXP();

It also looks like you are not putting that in a class or a method. Things like that need to be in a method and a class.

Read full topic

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @NickIceypvp NickIceypvp
item.description:
@NickIceypvp wrote:

oh ok, i see. I don’t think it has to do with the semicolons, because when i take that code out, theres no errors.

Is there something wrong with my code?

Read full topic

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @baddy351 baddy351
item.description:
@baddy351 wrote:

if (NPCID == 2234 && playerHasItem((4447,1)) {
addItem(4447, 1);
deleteItem(447,1);
addSkillXP(50000, 21);
}

Well in what this is ^^ is correct, a class, interphase, or enum expecxted normally means a missing semicolon, or something is wrong with the lines that proceed it. so even if, it may not be in this, but just look around for a missing semi colon, etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @NickIceypvp NickIceypvp
item.description:
@NickIceypvp wrote:

Hi all,

I put this code in my npchandler:

if(NPCID == 2234 && playerHasItem((4447,1))
{
addItem(4447, 1);
deleteItem(447,1);
addSkillXP(50000, 21);
}

And, i get 4 errors. It says this:

src\com\rs2hd\packethandler\NpcPacketHandler.java:646: class, interface, or enum
expected
if(NPCID == 2234 && playerHasItem((4447,1))
^
src\com\rs2hd\packethandler\NpcPacketHandler.java:649: class, interface, or enum
expected
deleteItem(447,1);
^
src\com\rs2hd\packethandler\NpcPacketHandler.java:650: class, interface, or enum
expected
addSkillXP(50000, 21);
^
src\com\rs2hd\packethandler\NpcPacketHandler.java:651: class, interface, or enum
expected

}→

^
4 errors
Press any key to continue . . .

Thanks

Read full topic
